data.lyric:
[ti:Emotionless (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.90]Emotionless (Explicit) - Drake
[00:01.46]Producer：NO I.D./Noah "40" Shebib/The 25th Hour
[00:04.38]Mariah Carey：
[00:07.32]You've got me feeling emotionless
[00:17.53]Aye higher
[00:22.84]Ahhhhhhh
[00:37.83]You've got me fe
[00:40.00]You ohhhh
[00:44.98]Drake：
[00:47.49]Don't link me
[00:48.35]Don't hit me when you hear this and tell me your favorite song
[00:50.89]Don't tell me how you knew it would be like this all along
[00:53.72]I know the truth is you won't love me until I'm gone
[00:56.51]And even then the thing that comes after is movin' on
[00:59.35]I can't even capture the feeling I had at first
[01:02.26]Meetin' all my heroes like seein' how magic works
[01:04.98]The people I look up to are goin' from bad to worse
[01:07.76]Their actions out of character even when they rehearse
[01:10.59]Workin' in the land of the free the home of the brave
[01:13.38]I gotta bring my brothers or else I feel out of place
[01:16.20]Breakin' speed records on roads that these n**gas paved
[01:18.86]And they don't like that it's written all on they face
[01:21.81]I don't know how I'ma make it out of here clean
[01:24.53]Can't even keep track of who plays for the other team
[01:27.50]Iconic duos rip and split at the seams
[01:30.31]Good-hearted people are takin' it to extremes
[01:32.99]Leavin' me in limbo to question what I believe
[01:35.70]Leavin' me to ask what's their motive in makin' peace
[01:38.59]Leavin' me to not trust anybody I meet
[01:41.28]Leavin' me to ask is there anybody like me
[01:43.84]Mariah Carey：
[01:44.81]You've got me fe
[01:46.89]You ohhhh
[01:55.90]You've got me fe
[01:58.10]You ohhhh ayy
[02:05.05]Drake：
[02:05.72]Missin' out on my years
[02:07.20]There's times when I wish I was where I was
[02:09.39]Back when I used to wish I was here
[02:11.23]Missin' out on my days
[02:12.71]Scrollin' through life and fishin' for praise
[02:14.74]Opinions from total strangers take me out of my ways
[02:17.59]I'm tryna see who's there on the other end of the shade
[02:20.37]Most times it's just somebody that's under-aged
[02:23.06]That's probably just alone and afraid
[02:24.96]And lashin' out so that someone else can feel they pain
[02:27.71]I always hear people complain about the place that they live
[02:30.54]That all the people here are fake and they got nothin' to give
[02:33.31]'Cause they been starin' at somebody else's version of
[02:35.96]That makes another city seem more excitin' than it is
[02:39.00]I know a girl whose one goal was to visit Rome
[02:41.59]Then she finally got to Rome
[02:43.10]And all she did was post pictures for people at home
[02:45.85]'Cause all that mattered was impressin' everybody she's known
[02:48.66]I know another girl that's cryin' out for help
[02:50.68]But her latest caption is "Leave me alone"
[02:52.87]I know a girl happily married 'til she puts down her phone
[02:55.85]I know a girl that saves pictures from places she's flown
[02:58.44]To post later and make it look like she still on the go
[03:01.53]Look at the way we live
[03:02.84]I wasn't hidin' my kid from the world
[03:04.83]I was hidin' the world from my kid
[03:06.73]From empty souls who just wake up and look to debate
[03:09.41]Until you starin' at your seed you can never relate
[03:12.53]Breakin' news in my life I don't run to the blogs
[03:15.23]The only ones I wanna tell are the ones I can call
[03:17.92]They always ask why let the story run if it's false
[03:20.69]You know a wise man once said nothin' at all
[03:23.79]I'm exhausted and drained I can't even pretend
[03:26.43]All these people takin' miles when you give 'em an inch
[03:29.22]All these followers but who gon' follow me to the end
[03:32.04]I guess I'll make it to the end and I'ma find out then
[03:35.16]Mariah Carey：
[03:36.43]You've got me fe
[03:38.61]You ohhhh aye
[03:45.75]Higher higher
[03:58.73]You've got me fe
[04:00.87]You ohhhh aye
[04:08.10]Higher higher
data.trans:
[ti:Emotionless (Explicit)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:Scorpion (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.90]//
[00:01.46]//
[00:04.38]//
[00:07.32]你让我感觉冷酷无情
[00:17.53]更高些
[00:22.84]//
[00:37.83]你让我感觉
[00:40.00]你
[00:44.98]//
[00:47.49]不要联系我
[00:48.35]当你听到我火了时 不要给我打电话 告诉我你最爱的是哪首歌
[00:50.89]不要告诉我 你早就料到会有这一天
[00:53.72]我知道 事实是 你们非要到我走了才会爱我 
[00:56.51]即便如此 接下来的事情还是得继续
[00:59.35]我甚至无法捕捉到我最初的感觉
[01:02.26]见到我心目中的英雄 就好像看见了魔法一样
[01:04.98]我敬仰的那些人都越来越糟了
[01:07.76]他们的行为出乎意料 即使是在他们排练时
[01:10.59]在自由国度工作 勇敢者的国度
[01:13.38]我得带上我的兄弟 或者其他人 我感觉很不自在
[01:16.20]在伙计们铺设的道路上 打破之前的行驶速度纪录
[01:18.86]他们不喜欢那样 从他们脸上的表情可以看出来
[01:21.81]我不知道我要怎么身无一物地离开这里
[01:24.53]甚至不知道谁在为另一个队伍效力
[01:27.50]好朋友一起合作 最后却不欢而散
[01:30.31]心地善良的人正走向极端
[01:32.99]让我慌了神 开始质疑自己的信仰
[01:35.70]让我开始质疑他们建设和平的动机是什么
[01:38.59]让我不再相信我遇见的任何人
[01:41.28]让我怀疑有没有人像我一样
[01:43.84]//
[01:44.81]你让我感觉
[01:46.89]你
[01:55.90]你让我感觉
[01:58.10]你
[02:05.05]//
[02:05.72]错过了很多年
[02:07.20]我总是奢望自己能回到过去
[02:09.39]回到我想要的过去
[02:11.23]错过了那么多日子
[02:12.71]摸爬滚打地生活 追求荣誉
[02:14.74]一个陌生人的意见就让我迷失了方向
[02:17.59]我想要看清楚暗处的另一边是谁
[02:20.37]大多数情况下 只是一些未成年人
[02:23.06]那可能只是孤独和恐惧
[02:24.96]大声痛斥 这样别人才能感受到他们的痛苦
[02:27.71]我经常听到人们抱怨他们住的地方
[02:30.54]这里的人都很虚伪 他们从不付出什么
[02:33.31]因为他们一直在盯着看别人怎么做的
[02:35.96]这样 别的地方看起来似乎就比这里要更振奋人心
[02:39.00]我认识一个女孩 她唯一的目标就是去罗马
[02:41.59]她最终也去到了罗马
[02:43.10]她做的唯一一件事就是给在家里的人发照片
[02:45.85]因为最重要的就是 给她认识的每个人留下了一个好印象
[02:48.66]我还认识另一个大声哭泣 寻求帮助的女孩
[02:50.68]但她最近的要求是 别管我
[02:52.87]我认识一个女孩 直到她放下电话 才幸福地结了婚
[02:55.85]我认识一个女孩 她把她去过的地方的照片保存下来
[02:58.44]留着以后慢慢发出来 让人们以为她一直在旅行
[03:01.53]看看我们的生活方式
[03:02.84]我没有向全世界隐瞒我有孩子的事
[03:04.83]我也没有阻止孩子去接触世界
[03:06.73]从那些一醒来就开始吵架的空虚的灵魂里
[03:09.41]直到你看着自己的种子 你永远无法想起来
[03:12.53]生活中的爆炸性新闻 我没有热衷于博客
[03:15.23]我唯一想倾诉的人 也是那个我想给他打电话的人
[03:17.92]他们总是问为什么要让故事继续下去 既然它是假的
[03:20.69]你知道 聪明人从来不会说什么
[03:23.79]我精疲力竭 口干舌燥 我装不下去了
[03:26.43]他们那些人总是得寸进尺
[03:29.22]那些支持我的人 但是谁会跟着我走到最后呢
[03:32.04]我想我会坚持到最后 然后答案自见分晓
[03:35.16]//
[03:36.43]你让我感觉
[03:38.61]你
[03:45.75]更高些 更高些
[03:58.73]你让我感觉
[04:00.87]你
[04:08.10]更高些 更高些
